name: R5_v2_0535_for_R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R5.Hl7VSSignatureCode for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0535|2.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4B.

concept.display: Signed CMS-1500 claim form on file, e.g., authorization for release of any medical or other information necessary to process this claim and assignment of benefits.
Signed authorization for release of any medical or other information necessary to process this claim on file.
Signed authorization for assignment of benefits on file.
Signature generated by provider because the patient was not physically present for services.

contains.display: Signed CMS-1500 claim form on file, e.g., authorization for release of any medical or other information necessary to process this claim and assignment of benefits.
